name: Rome 92 A.D.: The Pathway to Power
name_original: Rome 92 A.D.: The Pathway to Power
description:
Rome 92 A.D.: The Pathway to Power is an adventure game developed by Millenium Interactive. It was originally released in 1993. It was published by Millenium Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Rome 92 A.D.: The Pathway to Power on PC.
